item.title: NBFC stock under  ₹50 Paisalo Digital jumps over 5% after THIS announcement

review.headline_rewrite: NBFC stock under  ₹50 Paisalo Digital jumps over 5% after THIS announcement
bullets: For the quarter ending June 2025, Paisalo Digital posted a 13.25% year-on-year (YoY) growth in net profit at ₹47 crore, compared to ₹41.5 crore
Despite rising expenses, including higher finance costs and impairment charges, the company recorded a 13.9% YoY growth in profit before tax (PBT) at ₹63.60
Total expenses climbed to ₹155.11 crore from ₹130.75 crore in Q1FY25.

item.title: India’s semiconductor leadership forum targets $50 billion industry, 1 million skilled jobs

review.headline_rewrite: India’s semiconductor leadership forum targets $50 billion industry, 1 million skilled jobs
bullets: Projections presented at the launch of the Forum today highlighted a $120 billion domestic semiconductor market by 2030, with the sector poised to generate
The phased strategy envisions foundation building - policy frameworks and infrastructure in 2025-26.
By 2035, India's semiconductor industry is poised to contribute to the country's GDP, the L&T official said.
